channel.title: Help!seems no1 can!plz help!
channel.description:
ok so lots of people have been trying to help me but no1 can...
Whenever i download a source or client for a 508 or 377 sometimes it has run but most of time it doesnt. If it has it doesnt work. Ive been told to copy a run from a diff server into one to give it a run... it then shows up for less than a second and disappears. Ive been told to get a better version of java also. I have jdk 6.12 so which of these ways works and what am i doing wrong? I dont use 508s much so plz help!
here is what my run looks like (508) its zooscapev1(espeon) @echo off cls cd ../build "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\java.exe" net/com/espeon/Server 43594 goto main pause
then this a compiler for a 317 that WORKS! @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
i have no idea why the run doesnt work... help me plz!

item.title: Help!seems no1 can!plz help!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Fixed, somehow he ended up without any Java files in his source :rolleyes:

Read full topic

@sexy_slay wrote:

go to control panel- Java-About and see what your version is

-Sexy Slay

item.title: Help!seems no1 can!plz help!
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“sexy slay, post:7, topic:276127”]ok i use the same source, so your lucky. ok
the build.bat code is @echo off cd ../src echo Compiling all files.... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/*.java pause

change the jdk1.6.0_13 to what ever version you have.

next the run.bat @echo off cls cd ../build "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe" net/com/espeon/Server 43594 goto main pause

again replace the jdk with your java version

hope i helped
-Sexy Slay[/quote]

i copied in the run then changed 13 to 12 and it did same thing

Read full topic

item.title: Help!seems no1 can!plz help!
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

ok i use the same source, so your lucky. ok
the build.bat code is @echo off cd ../src echo Compiling all files.... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/*.java pause

change the jdk1.6.0_13 to what ever version you have.

next the run.bat @echo off cls cd ../build "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe" net/com/espeon/Server 43594 goto main pause

again replace the jdk with your java version

hope i helped
-Sexy Slay

Read full topic

item.title: Help!seems no1 can!plz help!
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

ok so lots of people have been trying to help me but no1 can…

Whenever i download a source or client for a 508 or 377 sometimes it has run but most of time it doesnt. If it has it doesnt work. Ive been told to copy a run from a diff server into one to give it a run… it then shows up for less than a second and disappears. Ive been told to get a better version of java also. I have jdk 6.12 so which of these ways works and what am i doing wrong? I dont use 508s much so plz help!

here is what my run looks like (508) its zooscapev1(espeon)
@echo off
cls
cd …/build
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\java.exe” net/com/espeon/Server 43594
goto main
pause

then this a compiler for a 317 that WORKS!
@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

i have no idea why the run doesnt work… help me plz!

Read full topic
